name: web-voice-recognizer
description: Web voice recognition sample by Web Speech API

scripts.rmdist: if [ -e dist ]; then rm -r dist; fi
scripts.rmdocs: if [ -e docs ]; then rm -r docs; fi
scripts.build:ext: npm run rmdist && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ --no-optimize --no-source-maps
scripts.build:prod: npm run rmdocs && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ --no-optimize --no-source-maps --dist-dir docs
